虛.definition: emptiness; void; abstract theory or guiding principles; empty or unoccupied; diffident or timid; false; humble or modest; (of health) weak; virtual; in vain

虛不受補.definition: a person who is in poor health cannot handle sth so strong as a tonic

虛位以待.definition: to reserve a seat; to leave a position vacant

虛客族.definition: people who like to window-shop for unaffordable luxuries

虛宮格.definition: four-square box in which one practices writing a Chinese character

虛實.definition: what is true and what is false; (to get to know) the real situation

虛己以聽.definition: to listen to the ideas of others with an open mind (idiom)

虛席以待.definition: to reserve a seat for sb (idiom)

虛度光陰.definition: to waste time on worthless activities

虛張聲勢.definition: (idiom) to bluff; to bluster; to make an empty show of strength

虛心使人進步，驕傲使人落後.pinyin: xu1 xin1 shi3 ren2 jin4 bu4 , jiao1 ao4 shi3 ren2 luo4 hou4
虛心使人進步，驕傲使人落後.definition: modesty leads to progress, arrogance makes you fall behind (quote of Mao Zedong)

虛情假意.definition: false friendship; hypocritical show of affection

虛應了事.definition: see 虛應故事|虚应故事[xu1 ying4 gu4 shi4]

虛懷若谷.definition: receptive as an echoing canyon (idiom); modest and open-minded

虛掩.definition: to partially obscure; (of a door, gate or window) slightly open; ajar; not fully shut; unlocked; (of a jacket or shirt) unbuttoned

虛損.definition: (TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang; asthenia

虛擬.definition: to imagine; to make up; fictitious; theoretical; hypothetical; (computing) to emulate; (computing) virtual

虛擬專用網絡.pinyin: xu1 ni3 zhuan1 yong4 wang3 luo4

虛擬現實置標語言.pinyin: xu1 ni3 xian4 shi2 zhi4 biao1 yu3 yan2

虛擬私人網絡.pinyin: xu1 ni3 si1 ren2 wang3 luo4

虛文.definition: dead letter; rule no longer in force; empty formality

虛有其表.definition: looks impressive but is worthless (idiom); not as good as it looks; a reputation with no substance

虛構.definition: to make up; fabrication; fictional; imaginary

虛標.definition: to falsely or exaggeratedly label (a product)

虛歲.definition: one's age, according to the traditional Chinese method of reckoning (i.e. the number of Chinese calendar years in which one has lived) – In this system, a person's age at birth is one, and increases by one at the beginning of the first solar term 立春[Li4 chun1] each year, rather than on one's birthday.; contrasted with 實歲|实岁[shi2 sui4]

虛火.definition: excess of internal heat due to poor general condition (TCM); the prestige of another person, which one borrows for oneself

虛發.definition: to miss the target (with a bullet or an arrow)

虛線.definition: dotted line; dashed line; (math.) imaginary line

虛缺號.definition: white square character ( □ ), used to represent a missing ideograph

虛脫.definition: to collapse (from dehydration or loss of blood); heat exhaustion

虛虛實實.definition: hard to tell if it's real or sham

虛誇.definition: to boast; to brag; boastful; exaggerative; pompous; bombastic

虛驚.definition: false alarm; panic rumor; CL:場|场[chang2]
